our_tweets: This tweet. From the President of the United States?
I mean. Trump really is Big Boss from MSX Metal Gear!
Come on. This guy runs the world?
How can he possibly say this?
How does he get away with this?
And he said he was going to drain the swamp?
his_lines: THIS IS BIG BOSS. OPERATION INTRUDE N313.
PENETRATE THE ENEMY'S OUTER HEAVEN AND
DESTOROY THE ULTIMATE WEAPON
CONTACT MISSING GREY FOX AND SEARCH FOR
METAL GEAR! CONTACT IN THE BAND OF 12085
FROM NOW ON.
THIS IS BIG BOSS. MISION! GAIN ACCESS TO THE
ENEMY 'S FORTRESS, OUTER HEAVEN. TAKE ACTION
NOT TO BE DISCOVERED BY THE ENEMY.
THIS IS BIG BOSS. TAKE THE WEAPONS AND
EQUIPMENTS FROM THE ENEMY'S LORRY!! YOU
SHOULD HAVE AN I.D.CARD TO OPEN THE DOOR.
DON'T MOVE!
YOU ARE CAPTURED!
LISTEN! I'LL NEVER DIE... I'LL GET YOU. ONE
DAY. SEE YOU AGAIN...
THIS IS BIG BOSS. THERE MUST BE SOME
RESISTANCE . TRY TO CONTACT WITH THE
TRANSCEIVER!
THIS IS LEADER. I WILL BRIEF YOU ON THE
FORTRESS DETAILS. PLEASE CONTACT ON WAVEBAND
THIS IS BIG BOSS. PUT ON A GAS MASK IN THE
GAS ROOM.
THIS IS THE LEADER. GO TO THE SOUTH PART OF
THE 1ST FLOOR TO GET YOUR MASK.
RESCUED! RESISTANCE, DIANE WILL SUPPORT YOU
ON WAVEBAND 12033.
THIS IS RADIO KNK. EMERGENCY NEWS FLASH!
THERE WAS APPARENTLY A TREMENDOUS
EARTH TREMOR IN THE REGION OF GALZBURG,
SOUTH AFRICA AT MIDNIGHT.
FOXHOUNDER INTRUDED A FEW DAYS AGO AND IS
SAFE NOW. HE WAS CAPTURED BY THE ENEMY.
I'M SLEEPY.
OVERSLEPT!
PROBABLY, FOXHOUNDER GAINED ACCESS. DON'T
MAKE WAY FOR HIM, AT ANY COST.
THIS IS BIG BOSS. BREAK DOWN THE POWER
SUPPLY BOX WITH THE REMOTE-CONTROL MISSILE
TO GET RID OF THE HIGH-VOLTAGE.
THIS IS MR... THE REMOTE-CONTROL MISSILE IS
AVAILABLE IN THE SOUTHEASTERN AREA.
THIS IS BIG BOSS. WIND BARRIER IS EXTENDED
ON THE ROOFTOP. LOOK FOR THE BOMBBLASTSUIT
TO BE INTO THE BARRIER.
THIS IS BIG BOSS. CHECK YOUR EQUIPMENTS!
CHECK IF YOU HAVE BEEN BUGGED BY THE ENEMY.
THIS IS MR... THE BOMBBLASTSUIT CAN BE FOUND
IN THE BASEMENT.
FOXHOUNDER CALLED GREY FOX MUST BE CONFINED
IN THE SECRET CELL.
THE BEST WAY OF GAINING ACCESS TO THE SECRET
CELL, IS TO ALLOW THE ENEMY TO CAPTURE YOU.
THIS IS BIG BOSS. MOVE OUT ,AND LOCATE GREY
FOX 'S SOLITARY CELL. CHECK THE WALL!
I 'M GREY FOX. THE ULTIMATE WEAPON HAS
NUCLEAR WEAPONS DESIGNED FOR EVERY PART
OF EARTH. IF IT IS COMPLETED, NUCLEAR ATTACK
FROM ANYWHWRE WILL BE POSSIBLE.
THERE IS ONLY ONE WAY TO DESTOROY METAL
GEAR. DR. PETTROVICH, WHO DEVELOPED IT KNOW
THE ONLY METHOD.
THIS IS BIG BOSS. TAKE BACK YOUR WEAPONS AND
EQUIPMENTS, AND GET OUT OF HERE! THEY MUST
BE CONCEALED IN A ROOM. BREAK THE DOOR!
I TOOK BACK  THE WEAPONS AND EQUIPMENTS.
I'M SHOOT GUNNER! NOBODY HAS EVER BEEN ABLE
TO ESCAPE FROM HERE.
MR. SCHNEIDER, YOU SHOULD KNOCK THE WALL AND
BLAST IT WHICH SOUNDS IRREGULARLY.
THE ONLY WAY TO REACH THE COURTYARD IS BY
PARACHUTE.
DR. PETTROVICH IS CONFINED TO A SOLITARY
CELL IN THE COURTYARD.
I'M  MACHINEGUN KID! I'LL NEVER LET YOU GO
AHEAD!!
HELLO, DIANE. MACHINEGUN KID MUST BE KILLED
BY REMOTE-CONTROL MISSILE.
MR. SCHNEIDER, YOU CAN GET THE PARACHUTE ON
THE 2ND FLOOR.
HELLO DIANE, HIND-D MUST BE DESTOROYED BY
GRENADE LAUNCHER.
DR. PETTROVICH, IT 'S TOO LATE.
DR. PETTROVICH WAS QUICKLY MOVED TO BUILDING
NO .2. BUILDING NO .2 LIES 10KM TO THE NORTH
FROM HERE.
I GOOFED!! THE LORRY STARTED TO MOVE!
HELLO, DIANE. DESTOROY THE TANK WITH THE
LAND MINE.
THIS IS BIG BOSS. CHECK POINT! PUT ON AN
ENEMY'S UNIFORM AND GAIN ACCESS. WILL USE
WAVEBAND 12013 FOR FUTURE CONTACT.
MR. SCHNEIDER, ENEMY'S UNIFORM IS AVAILABLE
IN THE BASEMENT OF BUILDING NO .1. WILL
CONTACT IN THE BAND OF 12026 FROM NOW ON.
HELLO, DIANE. WILL CONTACT ON WAVEBAND 12091
FROM NOW ON.
THIS IS BIG BOSS. IT WAS JAMMING, BUT OK NOW.
DR. PETTROVICH IS CONFINED IN THE BASEMENT.
MR. SCHNEIDER, LEAD YOU TO THE GAS ROOM!
I'M FIRE TROOPER! I WILL BURN YOU ALIVE!
YOU ARE CAUGHT IN A TRAP. IN FACT, WE HAVE
CONFINED DR. PETTROVICH ON THE SECOND FLOOR.
I WILL GET YOU FOXHOUNDER!
MR. SCHNEIDER, THE FLASH LIGHT CAN BE FOUND
ON THE 1ST FLOOR.
HELLO, DIANE. PLEASE TAKE CARE, THERE MAY BE
A PITFALL.
HELLO, DIANE. THE DOORKEEPER, MR. ARNOLD IS
INVINCIBLE! ESCAPE!
YOU MUST HAVE A COMPASS TO CROSS THE DESERT.
YOU MIGHT BE ABLE TO CONTACT JENNIFER OF
RESISTANCE ON WAVEBAND 12048. BUT SHE IS
PROUD, AND WOULDN'T ANSWER, IF YOU WERE NOT
THE EXECUTIVE.
JENNIFER WILL ARRANGE A ROCKET LAUNCHER.
COME FOR A ROCKET LAUNCHER!
JENNIFER WILL OPEN THE DOOR.
MR. SCHNEIDER, THE COMPASS CAN BE FOUND ON
THE 2ND FLOOR.
THE DITCH WILL LEAD YOU TO THE NO.3 BUILDING.
DR. PETTROVICH, MY DAUGHTER ELLEN WAS TAKEN
AS HOSTAGE. SAVE ELLEN OR, I WON'T DISCUSS
METAL GEAR.
DR. PETTROVICH, METAL GEAR IS IN 100TH
BASEMENT OF BUILDING NO.3 20KM TO THE NORTH
OF HERE.
METAL GEAR CAN BE DESTOROYED IN ONLY ONE
WAY. ATTACH PLASTIC BOMB TO THE FOOT OF
METAL GEAR.
I FORGOT THE REMAINDER. ANYWAY, SET 16
UNITS. YOU CAN NOT, DESTOROY IF YOU COMMIT
AN ERROR IN THE ORDER.
MR. ARNOLD HAS AN I.D. CARD TO GET OUT OF
BUILDING NO.2. YOU SHOULD USE A ROCKET
LAUNCHER TO KILL MR. ARNOLD.
MR. SCHNEIDER, SECRET SUBWAY FROM THE
SOUTHEAST LEADS YOU TO NO.1 BUILDING.
COME IN
HELP ME
THANK YOU.
I'M THE DAUGHTER OF DR. PETTROVICH, ELLEN.
MY FATHER WAS FORCED TO DEVELOP METAL GEAR.
PLEASE HELP MY FATHER URGENTLY.
HELLO, DIANE... AN ANTIDOTE IS GOOD FOR THE
POISON OF A SCORPION. ...BYE
THIS IS BIG BOSS... ENTER THE LEFT DOOR.
THIS IS BIG BOSS. CREEP INTO THE LORRY ON
THE RIGHT SIDE.
JENNIFER, YOU SHOULD BREAK DOWN THE WALL.
JENNIFER, THERE IS AN OXYGEN CYLINDER BEYOND
THE WALL.
THIS IS BIG BOSS... STOP THE OPERATION.
SWITCH OFF YOUR MSX AT ONCE.
THIS IS THE COMMAND. ...OVER
JENNIFER, A CARD WHICH OPEN THE NEXT DOOR
LIES IN THE EAST OF BUILDING 3.
THE EASTERN SIDE LEADS TO THE DITCH OF
BUILDING 2. ...OVER
MR. SCHNEIDER, I HAVE DISCOVERED WHO THE
BOSS OF OUTER HEAVEN IS. THE BOSS IS .... OH
I'M COWARD DUCK! YOU CAN'T SHOOT ME, CAN
YOU?
I'M A BROTHER OF JENNIFER. CLIMB THE LEFT
LADDER WHEN ESCAPING.
HELLO, DIANE... USE THE HAND GUN TO CAPTURE
THE PRISONERS, NOT TO KILL THEM.
JENNIFER, COWARD DUCK HAS CARD 8. MY BROTHER
IS AMONG THE CAPTIVES. PLEASE DON'T KILL
THEM.
BOSS OF OUTER HEAVEN IS BIG BOSS, GENERAL
COMMANDANT OF FOXHOUND. EVERYTHING IS DONE
BY HIM.
JENNIFER, YOU MUST RUN FAST.
YEAH, I'M BIG BOSS GENERAL COMMANDANT OF
FOXHOUND. AND IN CHARGE OF THIS FORTRESS,
OUTER HEAVEN.
I GAVE YOU INSTRUCTIONS TO BRING BACK FALSE
INFORMATION OF METAL GEAR. HOWEVER, YOU
ACCOMPLISHED TOO MUCH.
YOU HAVE COMPLETELY SMASHED MY AMBITIONS.
SOLID SNAKE!! I WILL NOT DIE ALONE. YOU WILL
JOIN ME.
JENNIFER, YOU CAN EXTEND THE TIME LIMIT BY
USING A CIGARETTE. PLEASE RETURN IN SAFETY,
SOLID SNAKE!
DIANE. I DON'T KNOW HOW TO DEFEAT BIG BOSS.
IT ALL DEPENDS ON YOU. SOLID SNAKE! I LOVE..
NO, IT WAS A MERE NOTHING!
EMERGENCY!! THE SELF-DESTRUCTION SWITCH OF
OUTER HEAVEN HAS BEEN ACTIVATED. ESCAPE
QUICKLY!!
HELLO, DIANE... I SUPPOSE THEY HAVE A
SILENCER. ...BYE
